        let layer = layui.layer;
        let $ = layui.$;

åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œçš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼š â€‹
javascript
table.on('tool(test1)', function (obj) {
    console.log(obj);
    let event = obj.event;
    if (event === 'delete') {
        // åˆ é™¤æç¤º
        layer.confirm('ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤å—ï¼Ÿ', { btn: ['ok', 'close'] }, function (index) {
            // åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ
            console.log("åˆ é™¤");
            console.log(index);
            // å‘é€ Ajax è¯·æ±‚
            let roleId = obj.data.roleId;
            console.log("roleId");
            console.log(roleId);
            $.getJSON("http://localhost:8084/deleteRole", { roleId: roleId }, function (res) {
                console.log(res);
                if (res.code === 0) {
                    table.reload("test1");
                } else {

                }
            });
            layer.close(index);
        });
    } else if (event === 'edit') {
        // æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ
    }
});
å¯¹è¡¨æ ¼è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“ï¼š â€‹
javascript
// è¡¨æ ¼æ¸²æŸ“
table.render({
    elem: "#test1",
    url: "http://localhost:8084/getPages",
    page: {
        limit: 10,
        prev: "ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ",
        next: "ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µ"
    },
    toolbar: `
        <div>
            <button type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-blue layui-btn-sm">æ·»åŠ </button>
        </div>
    `,
    request: {
        pageName: "pageNo",
        limitName: "pageSize"
    },
    parseData: function (res) {
        return {
            code: res.code,
            msg: res.msg,
            data: res.data.page,
            count: res.data.total
        };
    },
    cols: [
        [
            {
                title: "è§’è‰²ç¼–å·",
                field: "roleId"
            },
            {
                title: "è§’è‰²åç§°",
                field: "roleName"
            },
            {
                title: "æ˜¯å¦ç¦ç”¨",
                templet: function (row) {
                    return row.status === 1? '<span class="layui-badge layui-bg-green">æœ‰æ•ˆ</span>' : '<span class="layui-badge layui-bg-orange">ç¦ç”¨</span>';
                }
            },
            {
                title: "æ“ä½œ",
                templet: function (row) {
                    let s = '<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 5px; position: relative;">' +
                        '<button lay-event="edit" type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-orange layui-btn-sm" style="position: relative; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);">' +
                        'æ›´æ–°</button>' +
                        '<button lay-event="delete" type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-red layui-btn-sm" style="position: relative; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);">' +
                        'åˆ é™¤</button>' +
                        '</div>';
                    return s;
                }
            }
        ]
    ]
});
</script>

å®Œæ•´ä»£ç å’Œæ•ˆæœ â€‹

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title>è§’è‰²ç®¡ç†</title>
		<link href="../../component/pear/css/pear.css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="../../admin/css/other/error.css" rel="stylesheet" />
	</head>
	<body class="pear-container">
				<table class="layui-hide" id="test1" ></table>
		<script src="../../component/layui/layui.js"></script>
		<script src="../../component/pear/pear.js"></script>
		<script>
			layui.use(function () {
				let table = layui.table;
				let layer = layui.layer;
				let $ = layui.$;

				table.on('tool(test1)',function(obj){
					console.log(obj);
					let event = obj.event;
					if(event == 'delete'){
						//åˆ é™¤
						layer.confirm(
							'ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤å—ï¼Ÿ',{
								btn:['ok','close']
							},function(index){
								//åˆ é™¤
								console.log("åˆ é™¤");
								console.log(index);
								//ajax
								let roleId = obj.data.roleId;
								console.log("roleId");
								console.log(roleId);
								$.getJSON("http://localhost:8084/deleteRole",{roleId:roleId},function(res){
									console.log(res);
									if(res.code==0){
										table.reload("test1");
									}else{

									}
								})

								layer.close(index)
							}
						);
					}else if(event == 'edit'){
						//æ›´æ–°
					}
				});

				//è¡¨æ ¼æ¸²æŸ“
				table.render({
					elem:"#test1",
					url:"http://localhost:8084/getPages",
					page:{
						limit:10,
						prev:"ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ",
						next:"ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µ"
					},
					toolbar:`
							<div>
								<button type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-blue layui-btn-sm">æ·»åŠ </button>
							</div>
					`,
					request:{
						pageName:"pageNo",
						limitName:"pageSize"
					},
					parseData:function(res){
						return{
							code:res.code,
							msg:res.msg,
							data:res.data.page,
							count:res.data.total
						}
					},
					cols:[[
						{
							title:"è§’è‰²ç¼–å·",
							field:"roleId"
						},
						{
							title:"è§’è‰²åç§°",
							field:"roleName"
						},
						{
							title:"æ˜¯å¦ç¦ç”¨",
							templet:function(row){
								return row.status == 1?'<span class="layui-badge layui-bg-green">æœ‰æ•ˆ</span></span>':'<span class="layui-badge layui-bg-orange">ç¦ç”¨</span>';
							}
						},
						{
							title: "æ“ä½œ",
							templet: function (row) {
								let s = '<div style="display: flex; flex - direction: column; align - items: center; gap: 5px; position: relative;">' +
									'<button lay-event="edit" type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-orange layui-btn-sm" style="position: relative; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);">' +
									'æ›´æ–°</button>' +
									'<button lay-event="delete" type="button" class="layui-btn layui-bg-red layui-btn-sm" style="position: relative; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);">' +
									'åˆ é™¤</button>' +
									'</div>';
								return s;
							}
						}
					]]
				})
			});
			
		</script>
	</body>
